prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that resembles a friendly spirit with a glowing aura.
I want a water-type Pokemon that has a sleek design and can swim gracefully through rivers.
Generate a fire-type Pokemon with a fiery mane and a playful personality.
Make a steel-type Pokemon that has a sturdy body and sharp, metallic features.
Imagine an electric-type Pokemon with bright colors and a dynamic, energetic pose.
Design a flying-type Pokemon with vibrant wings that can soar through the skies effortlessly.
Give me a grass-type Pokemon that blends in with its forest habitat and has leafy features.
